name: FIRE+RAGE
description:
This game is created for GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 game jam with the theme "One Time Use".

Genre: 2D shooter/puzzle

Join Blaze McDynamite, a badass angry Chihuahua, an arsonist turned into an agent, in a mission to rescue fellow agents from the evil BOTS.  Use flamethrower to shoot at bunch of bots and mean creatures. You can even shoot at bunch of very flammable gas tanks and create a chain explosion. Just make sure not to "accidentally" kill fellow agent ;P 

Controls:
Move - WASD or IJKL
Shoot - 'Space' or 'Right-Click'
Next Conversation - 'Enter'
Change Facing Direction based on mouse position

Credits:
SoundFX:  masterg180, techgkn, ryansnook, cemagar, pugaeme, nox-sound
Music: valo, podenecromaniac
Font: blambot
